thread.title: BreadTalk opens its biggest outlet at Oman Avenues Mall
thread.title_full: BreadTalk opens its biggest outlet at Oman Avenues Mall | MENAFN.COM

author: Muscat Daily
title: BreadTalk opens its biggest outlet at Oman Avenues Mall
text:
(MENAFN - Muscat Daily) Leading boutique bakery BreadTalk has opened the doors of its new flagship outlet at Oman Avenues Mall.  Positioned in one of the sultanate's most vibrant and diverse commercial locations the new branch is set to treat BreadTalk fans and shoppers alike with its freshly-baked delicacies and other sweet delights.
'As our fourth and biggest branch this resembles exactly what BreadTalk is all about featuring table service an extended outdoor seating area within the mall and a greater variety of beverages and trendsetting bites from a world-renowned brand all perfected with a relaxed atmosphere and stylish dcor' said Jannat Moosa marketing director at Bin Mirza International.
'It is our philosophy to continuously offer customers the very best and through our new pleasing design and service provisions we are taking BreadTalk to the next level in Oman. The outlet is now open with further changes to the menu scheduled for the near future.'
She added 'Following our characteristic design of an open-plan dining area including our 'see thru' kitchen customers can be confident that we are operating according to international best practices as we deliver an unforgettable dining experience.'
With seating for more than 50 including its extended balcony seating BreadTalk's customers can already enjoy the best of the boutique bakery's basics including freshly baked breads creative cakes and the like. Other branches are located at The Wave Muscat Bareeq al Shatti Mall and Qurum City Centre.
